IO Operations#

int mlx_load_file(mlx_array *res, FILE *in_stream, const mlx_stream s)#
int mlx_load(mlx_array *res, const char *file, const mlx_stream s)#
int mlx_load_safetensors_file(mlx_map_string_to_array *res_0, mlx_map_string_to_string *res_1, FILE *in_stream, const mlx_stream s)#
int mlx_load_safetensors(mlx_map_string_to_array *res_0, mlx_map_string_to_string *res_1, const char *file, const mlx_stream s)#
int mlx_save_file(FILE *out_stream, const mlx_array a)#
int mlx_save(const char *file, const mlx_array a)#
int mlx_save_safetensors_file(FILE *in_stream, const mlx_map_string_to_array param, const mlx_map_string_to_string metadata)#
int mlx_save_safetensors(const char *file, const mlx_map_string_to_array param, const mlx_map_string_to_string metadata)#
